short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used to adjust the volume of html audio/video tags

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to mute or adjust the volume of audio or video tags on the current tab. This is especially useful for adjusting an individual's audio on group video calls, or when you can't find that ad on a page talking over your video. Give it a try!
